original_text: Now when Jesus heard this, he withdrew from there in a boat to a desolate place by himself. But when the crowds heard it, they followed him on foot from the towns.
korean_text: 예수께서 들으시고 배를 타고 떠나사 따로 빈 들에 가시니 무리가 듣고 여러 고을로부터 걸어서 따라간지라

sentences.original_text: he withdrew from there in a boat
to a desolate place by himself.
But when the crowds heard it,
they followed him on foot from the towns.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여러 동네에서 걸어서 그를 따랐습니다.
